content.text: Karen: I still haven't found an apartment yet. I'm living in a hotel. Yesterday, I saw a "for rent" sign down the street from Jim and he said he didn't think it'd be such a good idea. He said it would be like we were living together. In different houses. Two blocks away.
Kevin:Â What am I going to do? [Refers to a large pictures of Jan and Michael] I'm gonna hang it up at home. I don't have a lot of art. [smirks]
